title: Promoting cleaner cooking technologies in urban Malawi: Assessing the acceptance of pellet-fed gasifier cookstoves from a pilot targeted distribution model

Source: Energy for Sustainable Development, Volume 83

Author(s): Leo C. Zulu, Judith F.M. Kamoto, Ida N.S. Djenontin, Charles B.L. Jumbe, Innocent Pangapanga-Phiri, Robert B. Richardson, Mitelo Subakanya, Pascal Nzokou, Stephy D. Makungwa
